title: Untangling the World Knot of Consciousness # 13 w/ Gregg Henriques - The Cognitive Science Show
description: Gregg and I describe what the series has meant to us and then address some more general questions about the overall project, how it will lead to a future project:  The Elusive "I", the nature and function of the self, and how untangling the world knot relates to the meaning crisis.
